title: Stage Lv4-A2-S05
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I'd like to begin today's presentation. (variant 1)
Let me start by introducing myself. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I'd like to begin today's presentation. (variant 1)
Let me start by introducing myself. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 오늘의 목적은 새로운 제품을 소개하는 것입니다. (v1)
sentences.en: The purpose of today's presentation is to introduce our new product. (variant 1)
I'll divide this into three parts. (variant 1)
First, let's look at the current situation. (variant 1)
This chart will make it clear. (variant 1)
I'll take questions after the presentation. (variant 1)
This should take about 20 minutes. (variant 1)
I'll highlight the key points. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 여러분의 관심을 끌고 싶은 것이 있습니다. (v1)
sentences.en: There's something I'd like to draw your attention to. (variant 1)
I'd like to begin today's presentation. (variant 2)
Let me start by introducing myself. (variant 2)
